User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://gotapmode.info/sitemap.xml

# Allow search engines to crawl all pages
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /dashboard/
Disallow: /edit-profile/
Disallow: /profile-setup/
Disallow: /profile-details/
Disallow: /card-validation/

# Allow public profiles
Allow: /p/
